catalog Contacts

Turbo - tractor

Mini tractors have all-wheel or rear-wheel drive, which ensures excellent cross-country ability on various types of soil and in difficult conditions.

Equipped with a hydraulic system for connecting attachments with a lifting capacity of up to 600 kg, depending on the model.

The transmission can be mechanical or automatic, with the number of gears from 6 to 12 for optimal operation at different speeds.

The turning radius of mini tractors is only 2-3 meters, which makes them indispensable in limited spaces.
